t: Amazon.com: Amazon Fresh, Classic Potato Chips, 11 Oz (Previously Happy Belly, Packaging May Vary)
s: Not greasy or too salty like Lays or the other brands. Deep potato flavor, crisp and with different sized chips. Amazing. When I'm looking for a normal, plain potato chip, these are by far what I am craving! Just wish everyone else didn't think so, so that I could actually order more. :-) ... The Amazon Fresh Classic ...

t: Amazon Fresh needs to find its identity
s: March 9, 2025 - Consolidate and expand their non WFM brands for Fresh. While at the same time reducing the national brands they are not making enough margin on. Private labels are doing well nationally. Amazon Basics, Happy Belly and Aplenty should have a much larger presence at Fresh.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Fresh Classic Crust BBQ Chicken, 20.8 Oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Nope! Just..no. If you like a barbecued flavored pizza then, hard pass on this! A typical, chain Dollar store pizza tastes better than this Amazon Fresh brand Classic Crust BBQ Chicken Pizza! First of all, the sauce had a watered-down, light weight, basic smoked flavor.
